list.abs: Cecil Fridjohn , my father , came from an impecunious Irish Jewish family ., 塞西尔 · 弗雷特 , 我的父亲 , 来自贫穷的爱尔兰的犹太家庭.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... impecuniosity 没有钱 impecunious 没有钱的 impedance 阻抗.
Maria's parents were not impressed with the impecunious young man : no doubt they had discovered his father'S lamentable financial record .玛丽亚的父母对这个贫穷的年轻人没有什么好印象。毫无疑问，他们知道了他父亲糟糕的经济状况。
they are a titled but impecunious family ., 他们家有头衔却一贫如洗.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
